title: 3D Surface Plotting with Matplotlib
description: This lab is a step-by-step tutorial on how to plot a 3D surface using Matplotlib in Python. The 3D surface is colored with the coolwarm colormap and made opaque by using 'antialiased=False'. The tutorial also demonstrates using the .LinearLocator and custom formatting for the z axis tick labels.
